entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fading option is not activated on already opened files #77319

PullRequests

Created

  • Explictly jump off the main thread before serializing data to call Razor #77321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable basic end-to-end scenarios of extension method invocation. #77320
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Implement TypeScript ExternalAccess wrappers for AsynchronousOperationListener #77318
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change override completion to select text after updating the buffer. #76983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Implement SyntaxReplacer.VisitList #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix typos #77316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • PERF: Reduce the number of nodes walked during import completion commit. #77305
    VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations during completion in FilterToVisibleAndBrowsableSymbols #77315
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
